mapper.select: select no, title, name, to_char(wdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, hit from board b, member m where b.writer=m.id order by no desc
select no, title, content, writer, name, to_char(wdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, hit from board b, member m where no=#{no} and b.writer=m.id
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title},content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where no=#{no}
update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
